code: import React from"react";import'../styles.css';import moment from'moment';import{Button}from'semantic-ui-react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var refresh=function refresh(){window.location.reload();};var CardExampleCard=function CardExampleCard(_ref){var weatherData=_ref.weatherData;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"header",children:weatherData.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"button",inverted:true,color:"blue",circular:true,icon:"refresh",onClick:refresh})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"day",children:["Day : ",moment().format('dddd')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"day",children:moment().format('LL')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:weatherData.weather[0].main})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"temp",children:["Temperature: ",weatherData.main.temp," \xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"temp",children:["Humidity: ",weatherData.main.humidity," %"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"sunrise-sunset",children:["Sunrise: ",new Date(weatherData.sys.sunrise*100).toLocaleTimeString('en-IN')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"sunrise-sunset",children:["Sunset: ",new Date(weatherData.sys.sunset*100).toLocaleTimeString('en-IN')]})]})]});};export default CardExampleCard;
